item.title: Google Wave API combined with the Wookie engine and integrated in a Moodle platform
item.description: <p> To take a look, you need to head over to our <a href="http://getwookie.org/moodle">Moodle sandbox</a> and register yourself a profile (you&#8217;ll need to confirm your email address to activate the login). After that, go and <a href="http://getwookie.org/moodle/course/view.php?id=6">enrol yourself on this course</a>. </p> <p> Feel free to play <a class="zem_slink" title="Sudoku" rel="wikipedia" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sudoku">Sudoku</a>, mess with the poetry magnets, use the chat, and vote in the polls.
